name: The Rise of the Giant Beanstalk
name_original: The Rise of the Giant Beanstalk
description: In "The Rise of the Giant Beanstalk", a retro-style arcade game, you'll play as João as you defend the giant beanstalk from waves of flying enemies. Use a slingshot and climbing skills to take them down and help the beanstalk grow. Can you become the ultimate harvest master?
